childMarkdownRemark.html: An initiative to rebuild a run down masjid frequented by locals for congregational prayers in a remote village near Sakro, Sindh, Pakistan.

internal.content: An initiative to rebuild a run down masjid frequented by locals for congregational prayers in a remote village near Sakro, Sindh, Pakistan.

childMarkdownRemark.html: We have an opprotunity to participate in renovating / constructing an existing structure where over a 100 boys and girls come to gain deeni knowledge. This channel will cover the journey of renovating the existing structure as well as constructing a portion to accomodate over crowded space.
